siminov.connect.service.design

Interface IService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRequest, IResource, IServiceEvents
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Service

    public interface IService
extends IRequest, IServiceEvents, IResource
    It provides blue print for classes which wants to implement service
